    • Constructor Detail

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String name,
                  java.lang.String crewType,
                  int health,
                  int repairAbility,
                  int searchAbility)
        Constructor of CrewMember
        Parameters:
        name - Name of crew member
        crewType - Type of crew member (6 types)
        health - HP of crew member
        repairAbility - How much HP that a crew member can recover to the space shield (out of 100%)
        searchAbility - The possibility that crew member can find one part of transporter (out of 100%)
